main.name: Abhishek Bhargava
main.bio: Thorough and meticulous Software engineer passionate about helping businesses succeed with a solid understanding and 2+ years of experience in analytics and software development.Leverages comprehensive technical expertise for software engineering, data management, and developing innovative business solutions for corporate customers.  Looking forward to join a progressive organization that will allow me to utilize my previous experience along with incorporating my skills & knowledge.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to drop me a message

education.degree: M.Sc in Business Information and Analytical Systems ( Grade 2:1 )
Bachelors in Computer Science and Engineering ( Grade 2:1 )

work.title: ASSOCIATE SOFTWARE ENGINEER
work.description1: Performed requirements analysis, design, development and test management of monthly 100 M/D releases
work.description2: Conducted research using focus groups on 3 different products and increased sales by 11% due to the findings.
work.description3: Automated ETL process, making it easier to wrangle data and reducing time by as much as 40%.

work.title: Development Intern
work.description1: Designed advanced Android applications using Android Studio.
work.description2: Worked in a cross functional environment to design and define new features.
work.description3: Continuously performed unit testing in coordination with the testing team to develop better products with fewer bugs.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
